title: Musical puff pastry selection
description: Homemade puff pastry is conjured into a homage to Edith Piaf, with chocolate and hazelnut palmiers in the shape of bass clefs, Marsala and coffee millefeuille decorated to look like a piano keyboard and pastry horns filled with a raspberry cream. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a food processor, 12 cream horn moulds, two baking trays, a piping bag and two nozzles (one small plain and one large star).
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
500g/1lb 2oz unsalted butter, cold, plus extra for greasing
½ tsp lemon juice mixed with 250ml/9fl oz cold water
1 tbsp icing sugar, plus extra for dusting
30g/1oz dark chocolate chips, ground in a coffee grinder or food processor
pink, red and white/cream roses, for decoration
